author: draganrakita
content: Do we have test that tests that all values are used (both account and storage) in bal?

author: draganrakita
content: Do we have test with invalid bytecode format (aka EIP-7702 bytecode with invalid length. Additional bytes, missing address bytes, wrong prefix 0xef0100)

author: raxhvl
content: Could you elaborate what you mean by all values used?

author: raxhvl
content: This is more of a 7702 tests no? Not specific to BAL?

author: m0_ox
content: `bal@v1.3.0` tests released [here](https://github.com/ethereum/execution-spec-tests/releases/tag/bal%40v1.3.0). This release expands the `test_bal_sstore_and_oog` test cases to test boundary conditions around the EIP-2200 stipend check, discussed [here](https://discord.com/channels/595666850260713488/1364000387195076608/1427168501088653363), as well as updates to opcode test issues discussed [here](https://discord.com/channels/595666850260713488/1364000387195076608/1427114928598155354) and in preceding context above it.

author: m0_ox
content: As before, please run these and flag any friction points and direct any questions here ðŸ™‚
